Traits.Name: Inscrutable
Traits.Content: The sphinx is immune to any effect that would sense its emotions or read its thoughts, as well as any divination spell that it refuses. Wisdom (Insight) checks made to ascertain the sphinx's intentions or sincerity have disadvantage.

Traits.Name: Magic Weapons
Traits.Content: The sphinx's weapon attacks are magical.

Actions.Name: Multiattack
Actions.Content: The sphinx makes a ram attack and two claw attacks.

Actions.Name: Ram
Actions.Content: Melee Weapon Attack: +9 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 17 (3d8+4) bludgeoning damage.

Actions.Name: Claw
Actions.Content: Melee Weapon Attack: +9 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 13 (2d8+4) slashing damage.

Actions.Name: Multiattack
Actions.Content: The manticore makes two attacks, one with its bite and one with its claws.

Actions.Name: Bite
Actions.Content: Melee Weapon Attack: +7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 11 (2d6+4) piercing damage.

Actions.Name: Claws
Actions.Content: Melee Weapon Attack: +7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 13 (2d8+4) slashing damage.

Actions.Name: Stinger
Actions.Content: Melee Weapon Attack: +7 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. Hit: 11 (2d6+4) piercing damage. The target must make a DC 14 Constitution saving throw, taking 24 (7d6) poison damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

Traits.Name: Keen Smell
Traits.Content: The serpopard has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on smell.

Traits.Name: Pounce
Traits.Content: If the serpopard moves at least 20 feet straight toward a creature and then hits it with a claw attack on the same turn, that target must succeed on a DC 14 Strength saving throw or be knocked prone. If the target is prone, the serpopard can make one bite attack against it as a bonus action.

Actions.Name: Bite
Actions.Content: Melee Weapon Attack: +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 9 (1d10+4) piercing damage, and the target must make a DC 14 Constitution saving throw, taking 10 (3d6) poison damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.
